ygData.subject: -----PRESS RELEASE-----
ygData.msgSnippet: (Press Release -  Singapore) We ushered in the new year with parties and great celebrations , many of us were on holiday and may have even leveled up . With
ygData.messageBody:
(Press Release - Singapore)

We ushered in the new year with parties and great
celebrations , many of us were on holiday and may
have even leveled up . With the aftermath of the new
year , and the assurance that our servers have not crashed
and all the user records were not deleted .....

2 servers have celebrated in cool fashion with creation of 2 sisters guilds .
After a much heated debated on the guild names...
(Actually we just spent 10-15mins
everyone wanted to get back to EQ)

On Erollisi Marr we have ...
The "Lions of Erollisi"
(*Estimated 30+ members)

On Lanys T'Vyl we have ...
The "Lions of Lanys"
(*Estimated 15+ members)

*Estimates based on number of known singaporeans
based there .

Both guilds have agreed to work together to provide a solid
enviroment for EQ'ers in Singapore . (Duh!)


Happy New Year and Let the the Good Times Roll...


(Press Release Unquote)


WOOHOO !
Those of u still undecided whether or not
to start in a new server should give Lanys
a try . Its quite a good playing enviroment .
There are actually quite a large number of
newbies who just got the game for christmas
or never got beyond level 20 in their old servers...

Come on .... Guk is still EMPTY...
What are u waiting for ? =)

Mezz , 16th Circle of Enchantment
